glsa.title: rclone: Weak random number generation
glsa.synopsis: rclone uses weak random number generation such that generated passwords can be easily cracked.

background.p: rclone is a problem to sync files to and from various cloud storage providers.

description.p: Passwords generated with rclone were insecurely generated and are vulnerable to brute force attacks.

impact.p: Data kept secret with a password generated by rclone may be disclosed to a local attacker.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All rclone users should upgrade to the latest version:
